name: node-red-contrib-hubitat
description: Node Red module for Hubitat API
author: Francois Blackburn

scripts.bump:prepare: git checkout master && git pull origin master
scripts.bump:patch: yarn bump:prepare && yarn version --patch && yarn bump:complete
scripts.bump:minor: yarn bump:prepare && yarn version --minor && yarn bump:complete
scripts.bump:major: yarn bump:prepare && yarn version --major && yarn bump:complete
scripts.bump:complete: git push origin && git push origin --tags
